Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP41

Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP41.view.GUIPackage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertPopup
    Popup used to display alert messages
    CardChoiceScene
    Scene that displays the god cards selected by the challenger and asks user to choose one
    CardPopup  
    ConnectionScene
    Scene that asks for ip and port needed to connect to the server
    EndScene
    End scene with credits and thanks
    FirstCardPopup
    Popup used to display a god card effect and to select/deselect it
    GameScene
    Main game scene where the board and all the changes that happen to it are displayed
    GodPowerScene
    Scene that displays all the available god cards and asks the challenger to choose a number of them equal to the number of players
    GUI  
    HelpPopup
    Popup that contains the game rules
    LoginScene
    Scene used to get user's nickname
    LoserPopup
    Popup used to display a player who has lost because both of his workers are stuck
    NumberScene
    Scene used to get the number of players for the match
    PlayerScene
    Scene that displays players'info (name, color, god card) and asks user (if challenger) to choose the start player
    PowerPopup
    Popup used to ask the user if he wants to activate his god power
    SecondCardPopup
    Popup used to display a god card effect (not selectable)
    TransitionHandler
    Class used to set the scenes go to a specific scene
    WaitingScene
    Scene used to wait for other players'choices
    WinnerScene
    Scene used to display the winner of the game
